name: Angel's Robe
data: It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users intelligence nicely.
It increases the users charisma impressively.
It has low armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration incredibly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'vocal training'.
Angel's Robe is an artifact of the goddess Kirvana.
Angel's Robe allows the wearer to gain an extra tick every so often.
